articles.author: Chris Schad
articles.title: Gophers win, 3 MN teams have shot at Frozen Four - Bring Me The News
articles.description: The Gophers advanced but St. Cloud State wasn't as fortunate.
articles.content:
The Minnesota Golden Gopher men's hockey team advanced in the NCAA Tournament on Friday night but St. Cloud State's loss to Quinnipiac killed the dream of an all-Minnesota Frozen Four.
